item.title: Define all maximum of all subarrays of sliding window size k
item.description: Source code Problem description Given an array of n element. Define the maximum value of every sliding window size k of that array. A window size k of the array is any subarray of k elements of original array. Algorithm 1. Naive algorithm Naive algorithm is to scan each window separately, and find the maximum value of each window. Time complexity: \( O(n \times k) \) Space complexity: \( O(1) \)
